page.title: 13Houghton-Religion
page.content: Houghton-Le-Spring supports a number of religious buildings of different faiths.There are Roman Catholic & Anglican churches,a Methodist chapel,a Preslyterian church & a salvation army hall.The town also contains a Jehovah's witness kingdom hall & a Betheny church.The largest of the churches is the church of St.Michael. It is mainly of the early English & decorated style 1230-1300 & the north wall of the chancel can be dated to the Norman times.The church is in the shape of a cross & the east window is regarded as one of the best in country .The tower once supported an octagonal spire,but was later replaced by a heightened tower with an illuminated clock and 8 bells.
